reference.shortdesc: The notices element references a topic containing special notice information, for example, legal notices about supplementary copyrights and trademarks associated with the book.

example.title: Example
example.p: This example references a notices topic that contains legal content.
example.codeblock: <backmatter> <notices href="notices.dita" navtitle="Legal notices"/> <booklists> <!-- Index, glossary, or other lists --> </booklists> </backmatter>
